attributes.title: Arunagiri Yogishwara and Nithyananda - Experiences of Living with 'Sadashiva'
attributes.description:
"October 1st, 2016 - During todayâ€™s morning Satsang, His Holiness Paramahamsa Nithyananda 
welcomes the next batch of Nithyananda Yogam participants who have just arrived at the Aadheenam. 
He goes on to reveal the deeper more intimate details of his profound experiences with Arunagiri Yogeshwara, 
Sadashiva Himself, and blesses all the Nithyananda Yogam participants to live in that Space."
